functions.sin: Trigonometric sine Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.cos: Trigonometric cosine Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.tan: Trigonometric tangent Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.log: Logarithm Universal Function. Takes base [defaults to 10] as keyword argument.
functions.srqt: Square root Universal Function. Takes return_complex (bool) as keyword argument.
functions.root_n: Root N Universal Function. Takes index and return_complex (bool) as keyword arguments.
functions.factorial: Factorial Universal Function. Input must be an int.
functions.abs: Absolute Value Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.sinh: Hyperbolic sine Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.cosh: Hyperbolic cosine Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.tanh: Hyperbolic tangent Universal Function. Accepts complex numbers.
functions.permutation: Group Theory permutation function. Input must be an int. Takes k (int) and circular (bool) as keyword arguments.
functions.combinatorial: Group Theory combinatorial function. Inputs must be integers. Takes repetitions (bool) as keyword arguments.
functions.variation: Group Theory variation function. Input must be integers. Takes repetitions (bool) as keyword arguments.
